column4: Question, during the Install process -- I choose "Guided - resize SCSI1 (0,0,0), partition #1 (sda) and use freed space:     (New Partition size: <---------------||-------------------------------> (194.7 GB) : My question is this, when it says "New Partition Size" is it saying "The size of the to-be-created Ubuntu Partition" or "The new size of the original partition" ?
Can Ubuntu properly read/use a compression enabled NTFS filesystem?
